WorkItem.ClosedComment: Working in most recent build, most if not all mana restoration mechanics should also be working correctly
WorkItem.Description:
Tried to import my character from the armory - Fuseitana of Korialstrasz, and got an overflow error, details in attached file.
 
If I choose Continue, the character shows up with the equipped gear but the Comparisons panel has a big red X through it.  No gear or enchant selections show up.
 
v2.2.24 has been working fine while this character was in Enh spec, it only started giving errors when I switched to my Resto spec.  This also happens when I try to load this character / spec combo from character profiler.
WorkItem.Summary: [RestoSham] Overflow Error on Import from Armory

Comments.Message: I tried to load your toon on my computer too and it does the same thing.
At least I know it's not my installation.
I'm still having this problem with this toon.  Is there anything in the works about how I can correct it?  Rawr is unusable for me now.

Well, I loaded you up in my development copy just now and saw some definite funkiness. As soon as I changed your meta gem to something supported by the RestoSham model, everything started working normally, so if that doesn't fix it in your version (which should be 2.2.27 now), it's probably fixed for 2.2.28.

Transmute yourself an Earthsiege Diamond and get a friend to cut it Insightful and you'll be all set. ^^

This is still a bug though, an invalid meta shouldn't break the model.
Oh, wow, i didn't even realize that meta was in there.  I don't play this spec a lot.
Its a problem with the SpecialEffects triggers I'll alert Antivyris
Thanks to all for the help.  The meta is correctly the Insightful now.  Hurriedly prepping for raid as my off-spec caused me to craft the Invigorating, send it to my Shammy and socket it.
